metadata.synopsis: The dialog for the Flaming Fist manip who stands near the main entrance of the Big Barn that holds donations for the refugee camp. If any of the other Fists catch the player, they bring them to him for the interrogation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Refugee Camp, Big Barn, 62; 43; -114Approach and talk to the NPC.

8.speaker: Manip Nestor
8.text: You might be a nuisance but at least neither of us got blown up, eh?
8.context: NodeContext: Genuinely grateful, possibly even a little warm (if gruff about it)

11.speaker: Manip Nestor
11.text: Can't keep out of trouble, can you?
11.context: NodeContext: Weary annoyance at the player

14.speaker: Manip Nestor
14.text: I heard you tracked down the man responsible for those explosive toys - good work.
14.context: NodeContext: Genuinely grateful (if gruff about it)

157.speaker: Manip Nestor
157.text: Now give me some room - I need to make sure the rest of these donations are safe.
157.context: NodeContext: Dismissive of the player but concerned about the potentially explosive donations

132.speaker: Manip Nestor
132.text: You try and find whoever is responsible for this.
132.context:
NodeContext: The line should be copied from 00532ddb-1204-f29d-9375-a1f685965969, N206.
> Resignation; really doesn't have time for this shit himself

40.speaker: Manip Nestor
40.context: NodeContext: Very gruff and grudging apology

51.speaker: Manip Nestor
51.text: What was that?! Are you all right?
51.context: NodeContext: Has just been shocked by an explosion; genuinely concerned for a moment despite everything

107.speaker: Player
107.text: As all right as I can be after being next to a fiery explosion.

74.speaker: Manip Nestor
74.text: From the sound of that explosion, I'm not surprised.

104.speaker: Manip Nestor
104.context: NodeContext: Still gruffly concerned/a little shellshocked

205.speaker: Player
205.text: I was just looking at the donations and some of them blew up.

168.speaker: Player
168.text: So it turns out those toy bears were explosive.

49.speaker: Manip Nestor
49.text: What? Those are children's toys - which means if a child had picked one up... I don't want to think about it.

75.speaker: Manip Nestor
75.text: How do I know you're not the one who planted those explosives?

129.speaker: Player
129.text: Because I've already found and dealt with the real culprit: Arfur Gregorio. You're lucky I was here.

69.speaker: Manip Nestor
69.text: You might be a nuisance but at least neither of us got blown up, eh?
69.context: NodeContext: Genuinely grateful, possibly even a little warm (if gruff about it)

202.speaker: Player
202.text: I just wanted to see what was inside the barn.

3.speaker: Manip Nestor
3.text: That's not good enough. You're under arrest.
3.context: NodeContext: Resignation/annoyance at the player having made more work for him

183.speaker: Player
183.text: I almost died in the explosion myself! I want to find whoever's responsible.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: Why would I disarm my own explosives? I just want to find whoever's responsible.

0.speaker: Manip Nestor
0.text: All right. I guess it can't hurt. I'll check up on the rest of the goods. You try and find whoever is responsible for this.
0.context: NodeContext: Resignation; really doesn't have time for this shit himself

114.speaker: Player
114.text: I was sent by the Council to check up on your operation.

103.speaker: Manip Nestor
103.text: I had a feeling something was wrong in the barn - I wanted to make sure nobody got hurt. Take a look if you must.
103.context: NodeContext: Resignation (and slight genuine concern at possibly being reported)

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Activate the toy and toss it to him.

198.speaker: Player
198.text: Activate the toy and toss it to him.

201.speaker: Manip Nestor
201.text: It stinks of smokepowder in here...

199.speaker: Player
199.text: Look at me - have my eyebrows been singed off?

125.speaker: Manip Nestor
125.text: Well, you're still talking, so you can't be that bad.
125.context: NodeContext: Gruffly relieved the player is okay despite everything

53.speaker: Manip Nestor
53.text: The hells are you doing in here?
53.context: NodeContext: Angry at the player's trespassing

56.speaker: Manip Nestor
56.text: Show me where these explosive toys are, then.
56.context: NodeContext: Suspicious/clearly doesn't quite believe the player

57.speaker: Manip Nestor
57.text: Gods - any one of us could've been blown to smithereens.

58.speaker: Manip Nestor
58.text: What was that? Stay here - I'll take a look.
58.context: NodeContext: Alert/listening/authoritative after hearing something be disarmed

61.speaker: Manip Nestor
61.text: I don't need you standing here gawking, thanks.
61.context: NodeContext: Dismissive/irritated by the player's presence

67.speaker: Manip Nestor
67.context: NodeContext: Weary at seeing the player again

82.speaker: Manip Nestor
82.context: NodeContext: A little bored; he's been doing this all day

99.speaker: Manip Nestor
99.text: Do you not have eyes? The refugees.

15.speaker: Manip Nestor
15.text: If you don't have anything to donate, you can get going.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I need to get into the barn - right now. Something dangerous might be among the donations.

79.speaker: Manip Nestor
79.text: I'm going to let you through because I don't want to take any risks. But you'd better not be lying.

159.speaker: Manip Nestor
159.text: Nice try. But nothing gets past us. Now move along.

172.speaker: Player
172.text: Did you know that somebody's donated a load of toys filled with explosives?

96.speaker: Manip Nestor
96.text: Thank you. I'm sure your contribution will be greatly appreciated.

182.speaker: Player
182.text: I want to donate some supplies.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'd like to take the donation into the barn myself.

108.speaker: Manip Nestor
108.text: Well... if you must. I suppose it saves me the walk. But if you're going to do it, hurry up.
108.context: NodeContext: Slightly suspicious but willing to allow it (and slightly irritated by the player's presence of course)

163.speaker: Manip Nestor
163.text: I'm not letting you into the barn. Give me what you've got to donate or leave.
163.context: NodeContext: Increasingly annoyed with the player's antics

153.speaker: Player
153.text: Maybe people would donate more if you weren't so rude.

30.speaker: Manip Nestor
30.text: Nothing to donate? Then, again, do kindly leave.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Actually, I think I'll hang onto it for now.

175.speaker: Manip Nestor
175.text: Very giving of you. Now go waste someone else's time.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: I can heal folk, if that's any use.

145.speaker: Manip Nestor
145.text: These folks' empty bellies and purses need healing more than anything, priest.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: It looks like you have plenty already.

134.speaker: Manip Nestor
134.text: You wouldn't be saying that if you'd seen this inventory - or how many refugees we have here.

64.speaker: Manip Nestor
64.text: Very funny. You can make a donation to the refugees or you can leave.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: I'll make a donation - what do you need?

126.speaker: Manip Nestor
126.text: Food, sundries, gold - these poor refugee sods need all the help they can get.

88.speaker: Manip Nestor
88.text: Are you gonna search the barn or what?
88.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at the player's faffing around/wasting time

97.speaker: Manip Nestor
97.text: You - turn around and toddle your way right back out of here.

13.speaker: Manip Nestor
13.text: Everything in this barn has been donated for the refugees - not you. Now piss off.

54.speaker: Manip Nestor
54.text: I'm doing my job - you can window-shop elsewhere.

167.speaker: Player
167.text: What kind of things have people donated?

4.speaker: Manip Nestor
4.text: Food. Sundries. Toys, even. What would you expect for people who've lost everything?
4.context: NodeContext: Clearly appreciative of the donations for the refugees but soon wary of/annoyed by the player again after the -

121.speaker: Manip Nestor
121.text: Now are you going to clear off or not?

138.speaker: Player
138.text: Did you know that somebody's donated a load of toys filled with explosives?

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Why does a barn need the Flaming Fist to protect it?

173.speaker: Manip Nestor
173.text: In case little weasels like you come sniffing around.
173.context: NodeContext: Wary of the player/annoyed at them

197.speaker: Player
197.text: Is there anything I can do to help?

131.speaker: Manip Nestor
131.text: Not unless you want to make a donation.
131.context: NodeContext: Irritated at the player's questions

180.speaker: Player
180.text: Why do you care about the refugees so much?

44.speaker: Manip Nestor
44.text: And you don't after all they've been through? And with the army of the Absolute at their backs?
44.context: NodeContext: Slightly incredulous at the question; annoyed at the player's ignorance

50.speaker: Manip Nestor
50.text: If you can't see it, I'm not going to waste my time explaining it to you.
50.context: NodeContext: Pretty annoyed now; wants the player to piss off so he doesn't have to deal with them

91.speaker: Player
91.text: I'd like to make a donation to the refugees, actually.

200.speaker: Manip Nestor
200.text: Guess you're not all bad. Give it here and I'll make sure it's kept safely with the other donations.
200.context: NodeContext: Gruff and a little wary still (does genuinely want donations for the refugees underneath it all)

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Ah, I meant I'd bring my donation later.

151.speaker: Player
151.text: Is this really going to help the refugees?

102.speaker: Manip Nestor
102.text: Look around you - these poor sods need all the help they can get.
102.context: NodeContext: Gruff sympathy for the refugees (but still annoyed at the player's ignorance)

115.speaker: Manip Nestor
115.text: You sure? This lot have been through enough without your ignorance.
115.context: NodeContext: Mild incredulousness and irritation at the player

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Fist [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53] reporting for duty, SIR! I was asked to check on the barn.

133.speaker: Manip Nestor
133.text: And I wasn't informed? Bloody meddling Flames... What are you still looking at? You've got a job to do, hop to it!
133.context: NodeContext: first part whispered to self, on "what" realises the player's still listening

33.speaker: Manip Nestor
33.text: Hang about - your uniform's not regulation. Neither are those weapons...

110.speaker: Manip Nestor
110.text: What are you still flapping your lips at me for? Get on with it.

139.speaker: Manip Nestor
139.text: Got something else to donate, have you?
139.context: NodeContext: Brusque (but not annoyed; the player DID donate before)

146.speaker: Manip Nestor
146.text: So you were sniffing round the barn, were you? Why?
146.context: NodeContext: Suspicious and annoyed by the player having trespassed

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Did you know that somebody's donated a load of toys filled with explosives?

141.speaker: Manip Nestor
141.text: What? Who'd put explosives in toys?

85.speaker: Manip Nestor
85.text: Very well. Show me these explosive toys, then.
85.context: NodeContext: Suspicious/clearly doesn't quite believe the player

142.speaker: Player
142.text: I was investigating a crime - I think some of the donations might be dangerous.

36.speaker: Manip Nestor
36.text: What? Dangerous? Is this a joke?

189.speaker: Player
189.text: So you're fine with innocent people getting hurt just because you won't own up to your guards' negligence?

45.speaker: Manip Nestor
45.text: Look, we're doing our best here - we're just stretched pretty thin, in case you hadn't noticed.
45.context: NodeContext: Incredulous/a little angry (but also a little cowed by the player's words)

43.speaker: Manip Nestor
43.text: Fine, you can look around. But if there's any funny business, it'll be straight to Wyrm's Rock with you.
43.context: NodeContext: Quiet but very real threat

191.speaker: Player
191.text: Please, go and check. It won't take much of your time, but it could save lives.

155.speaker: Manip Nestor
155.text: Fine, I'll look - but I'm doing it for the refugees, not you.
155.context: NodeContext: Admonishing; the latter is referring to the player's actions

118.speaker: Player
118.text: I was just curious about what's inside this barn.

116.speaker: Manip Nestor
116.text: This is a barn, not a museum - now get gone.

192.speaker: Player
192.text: All right, all right - I was looking for stuff to steal.

120.speaker: Manip Nestor
120.text: Appreciate the candour. Gonna have to arrest you, though.
120.context: NodeContext: Weary and annoyed at the player having made more work for him

68.speaker: Player
68.text: I'll be honest with you: I'm hot on the trail of my client's prize pig Lulabelle.

55.speaker: Manip Nestor
55.text: A... pig? You're looking for a pig?
55.context: NodeContext: Incredulous - but listening as he's been persuaded to

156.speaker: Player
156.text: Oh, yes - and she's a wily one. There's not a sty that can hold her.

150.speaker: Manip Nestor
150.text: You ought to be careful - I hear pigs eat people if given the chance.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Lulabelle's been stolen. I've been told to check every barn in the city - no exceptions.

77.speaker: Manip Nestor
77.text: Well, there is a pig here, I suppose.
77.context: NodeContext: Matter of fact - but then resigned

34.speaker: Player
34.text: She's an extremely rare Chionthar Swordback - I don't need to tell you how much they're worth.

170.speaker: Manip Nestor
170.text: I'm not one for animal husbandry - but I know Rivington certainly has its enthusiasts.
170.context: NodeContext: Is clearly wary of said enthusiastics/thinks they're weird

147.speaker: Player
147.text: I'm sorry, but if I tell you any more I could be putting Lulabelle's life in danger. She has piglets depending on her.

1.speaker: Manip Nestor
1.text: Piglets? Oh. Well. I hope you find her in time. For the little ones' sakes.

154.speaker: Manip Nestor
154.text: You can have a look. Just don't touch anything.
154.context: NodeContext: Relenting - think it's weird but will allow it

42.speaker: Manip Nestor
42.context: NodeContext: A little amused by the player's attempt

93.speaker: Manip Nestor
93.text: I'll let the boys at Wyrm's Rock deal with you.
93.context: NodeContext: Resignation/matter of fact; takes no pleasure in this, it's just required

169.speaker: Manip Nestor
169.text: Right, that's it - off to the cells with you.
169.context: NodeContext: Has had it with the player's bullshit by this point

178.speaker: Manip Nestor
178.text: Did I not just tell you you weren't allowed in here? What are you doing?
178.context: NodeContext: Angry at the player's trespassing

195.speaker: Manip Nestor
195.text: What are you...? Explosives? In toys?

196.speaker: Manip Nestor
196.text: Who's that rummaging around in there? Show yourself!

164.speaker: Manip Nestor
164.text: You have two seconds to explain yourself before you're under arrest.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I found a load of toy bears rigged to explode - but don't worry, I disarmed them.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: Allow yourself to be taken to prison.
